info.title: RevRing Voice AI API
info.description: RevRing Voice AI platform API for managing AI voice agents, phone calls, SIP trunks, and analytics. Build intelligent voice applications that can handle inbound and outbound phone calls with AI-powered conversational agents.

tags.name: SIP Trunks
tags.description: Manage SIP trunks for connecting agents to the phone network

tags.name: Agents
tags.description: Manage AI voice agents and their configuration

tags.name: Analytics
tags.description: Get analytics and metrics about your calls

tags.name: Knowledge Bases
tags.description: Manage knowledge bases and sources for agent retrieval-augmented generation

tags.name: Test Suites
tags.description: Manage test suites, test cases, and test runs for agent evaluation

get.description: Retrieve all SIP trunks for your organization. SIP trunks connect your AI agents to the phone network.

post.description: Create a new SIP trunk. Provide phone numbers that will route through this trunk.

get.description: Retrieve a specific SIP trunk by ID

patch.description: Update SIP trunk configuration including phone numbers

delete.description: Delete a SIP trunk. Cannot delete if agents are using it.

get.description: Retrieve all AI voice agents for your organization

post.description: Create a new AI voice agent with specified configuration

400.description: Validation error or invalid SIP trunk

details.description: Zod validation error details (when error is invalid_body)

get.description: Retrieve specific agent by ID

400.description: Bad request - Invalid body or invalid trunk

409.description: Agent is in use by test suites

message.example: Cannot delete this agent because it is assigned as a tester in one or more test suites

get.description: Get phone numbers assigned to an agent for inbound calls

post.description: Assign a phone number to an agent

delete.description: Remove a phone number from an agent

get.description: Get custom tools configured for an agent

post.description: Add a custom tool that the agent can invoke via function calling

delete.description: Remove a custom tool from an agent

get.description: List calls with filtering, sorting, and pagination

post.description: Initiate an outbound call with an agent

get.description: Retrieve call details by ID
Get analytics overview with time-series data and summary cards
Get the current number of active (ongoing) calls. Not affected by date filters.

post.description: Cancel a queued call. Only calls with status `QUEUED` can be cancelled.

message.example: Only queued calls can be cancelled

get.description: List knowledge bases linked to an agent

post.description: Link a knowledge base to an agent. The agent will use the knowledge base for retrieval-augmented generation during calls.

knowledgeBaseId.description: ID of the knowledge base to link

delete.description: Remove a knowledge base from an agent

get.description: List all knowledge bases for your organization

post.description: Create a new knowledge base. After creation, add sources (text, URL, or file) to populate it.

get.description: Retrieve a knowledge base by ID, including its sources

patch.description: Update knowledge base name or description

delete.description: Delete a knowledge base and all its sources. This also removes all agent links.

post.description:
Add a source to a knowledge base. Supports three source types:
- **Text**: Send JSON with `sourceType: "text"`, `displayName`, and `content`
- **URL**: Send JSON with `sourceType: "url"` and `originalUrl`
- **File**: Send `multipart/form-data` with a `file` field (max 20MB)

Maximum of 10 sources per knowledge base. Sources are processed asynchronously.

400.description: Invalid request or source limit reached

get.description: Get a specific source and its processing status

delete.description: Remove a source from a knowledge base

get.description: List all test suites for your organization with pagination

post.description: Create a new test suite targeting a specific agent

404.description: Target or tester agent not found

get.description: Retrieve a test suite by ID

delete.description: Delete a test suite and all its test cases and runs

get.description: List all test cases in a test suite

post.description: Add a test case to a test suite. Each test case includes a script for the tester to follow and a scoring rubric for evaluation.

get.description: Retrieve a specific test case

patch.description: Update a test case's script, rubric, or configuration

delete.description: Remove a test case from a test suite

post.description: Use AI to generate test case suggestions based on a natural language prompt. Generated tests are returned as suggestions and are not automatically added to the suite.

get.description: List test runs for a test suite with pagination

post.description: Start a new test run. This initiates real phone calls between a tester and the target agent for each test case. The suite must have at least one test case.

400.description: No test cases defined or invalid request

get.description: Retrieve a specific test run with its results

post.description: Cancel a running or queued test run. Already completed or cancelled runs cannot be cancelled.
Called before an inbound call is answered. Return variables to be merged with the agent's default variables for this call.

dialedAgentId.description: Agent ID when the call was routed directly to an agent (null if routed via phone number)

variables.description: Additional variables to merge with agent defaults

post.description: Called after a call ends with complete call details including transcript, recording, and summary.

hangupCause.description: Reason call ended. Common values: USER_ENDED, END_CALL_TOOL, SILENCE_TIMEOUT, MAX_DURATION, VOICEMAIL_DETECTED

agentId.description: Agent ID that handled the call

sipTrunkId.description: SIP trunk ID used for the call

agentCallerIdName.description: Caller ID name configured on the agent

variables.description: Merged template variables used during the call (includes pre-call webhook variables, API variables, and system variables)

createdAt.description: When the call record was created

updatedAt.description: When the call record was last updated

apiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
apiKeyAuth.description: API key for authentication. Generate API keys from the RevRing dashboard.

UnauthorizedError.description: Authentication required or API key invalid

SipTrunk.description: SIP Trunk for routing phone calls

cloud.description: Phone numbers associated with this trunk

updatedAt.description: When this trunk was last updated

SipTrunkCreate.description: Create a new SIP Trunk. Provide the proxy address and phone numbers.

password.description: SIP authentication password (not returned in responses)

cloud.description: Phone numbers to associate with this trunk

SipTrunkUpdate.description: Update SIP Trunk. Only phone numbers can be modified after creation.

cloud.description: Update phone numbers associated with this trunk

turnTimeoutSeconds.description: Seconds to wait for user response

llmTemperature.description: LLM temperature for response randomness (0 = deterministic, 2 = very creative)

language.description: Language code (e.g., en, es, fr, de)

preCallWebhookUrl.description: Webhook URL called before answering inbound calls

postCallWebhookUrl.description: Webhook URL called after call ends with transcript and recording

endCallEnabled.description: Allow agent to end the call

endCallRulesOverride.description: Custom instructions for when agent should end call

condition.description: When to offer this transfer option

voicemailAction.description: What to do when voicemail is detected

voicemailMessage.description: Message to leave on voicemail (if action is leave_message)

voiceId.description: Voice ID (copy from dashboard Voice Library)

voiceSpeed.description: Speech speed multiplier (0.5 = half speed, 1.5 = 1.5x speed)

phoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers assigned to this agent for inbound calls

customTools.description: Custom function calling tools available to this agent

mode.description: Agent mode. Set at creation time and cannot be changed. `single_prompt` uses a single system prompt; `conversation_flow` uses a multi-step flow definition.

flowDefinition.description: Conversation flow definition (only used when mode is `conversation_flow`)

testVariables.description: Variables used for test calls initiated from the dashboard

llmReasoningEffort.description: Controls the reasoning effort of the language model. Higher values produce more thorough but slower responses.

disableInterruptions.description: When enabled, the agent will not be interrupted by the caller while speaking

transferMode.description: Transfer mode. `cold` disconnects the AI before connecting to the destination. `warm` keeps the AI on the line to introduce the caller.

warmTransferConfig.description: Configuration for warm transfers (only used when transferMode is `warm`)

holdMessage.description: Message played to the caller while on hold

holdMusicEnabled.description: Whether to play hold music while the caller waits

summaryPrompt.description: Prompt used to generate a conversation summary for the human agent

introMessage.description: Message the AI speaks to the human agent before connecting the caller

playKeypadTouchToneEnabled.description: Enable the keypad input (DTMF) tool, allowing callers to press phone keys during the conversation

playKeypadTouchToneDescriptionOverride.description: Custom instructions for the keypad input tool behavior

knowledgeBaseRetrievalMode.description: How the agent queries linked knowledge bases. `automatic` retrieves context on every turn. `query_tool` lets the agent decide when to search.

knowledgeBaseChunks.description: Number of text chunks to retrieve per knowledge base query

knowledgeBaseSimilarityThreshold.description: Minimum similarity score for retrieved chunks (0-1). Higher values return only highly relevant results.

AgentCreate.description: Create a new AI voice agent

sipTrunkId.description: SIP trunk ID to use for this agent's calls

status.description: Agent status (active = can receive calls, disabled = inactive)

turnTimeoutSeconds.description: Seconds to wait for user response (-1 = no timeout)

silenceEndCallTimeoutSeconds.description: Silence duration before ending call (-1 = no timeout)

postCallWebhookUrl.description: Webhook URL called after call ends (optional)

voiceId.description: Voice ID (copy from dashboard Voice Library)

mode.description: Agent mode (immutable after creation). Defaults to `single_prompt`.

flowDefinition.description: Conversation flow definition (only used when mode is `conversation_flow`)

testVariables.description: Variables used for test calls initiated from the dashboard

llmReasoningEffort.description: Controls the reasoning effort of the language model. Higher values produce more thorough but slower responses.

disableInterruptions.description: When enabled, the agent will not be interrupted by the caller while speaking

transferMode.description: Transfer mode. `cold` disconnects the AI before connecting to the destination. `warm` keeps the AI on the line to introduce the caller.

warmTransferConfig.description: Configuration for warm transfers (only used when transferMode is `warm`)

holdMessage.description: Message played to the caller while on hold

holdMusicEnabled.description: Whether to play hold music while the caller waits

summaryPrompt.description: Prompt used to generate a conversation summary for the human agent

introMessage.description: Message the AI speaks to the human agent before connecting the caller

playKeypadTouchToneEnabled.description: Enable the keypad input (DTMF) tool, allowing callers to press phone keys during the conversation

playKeypadTouchToneDescriptionOverride.description: Custom instructions for the keypad input tool behavior

knowledgeBaseRetrievalMode.description: How the agent queries linked knowledge bases. `automatic` retrieves context on every turn. `query_tool` lets the agent decide when to search.

knowledgeBaseChunks.description: Number of text chunks to retrieve per knowledge base query

knowledgeBaseSimilarityThreshold.description: Minimum similarity score for retrieved chunks (0-1). Higher values return only highly relevant results.

AgentUpdate.description: Update an existing AI voice agent. All fields are optional.

sipTrunkId.description: SIP trunk ID to use for this agent's calls

status.description: Agent status (active = can receive calls, disabled = inactive)

turnTimeoutSeconds.description: Seconds to wait for user response (-1 = no timeout)

silenceEndCallTimeoutSeconds.description: Silence duration before ending call (-1 = no timeout)

postCallWebhookUrl.description: Webhook URL called after call ends (optional)

voiceId.description: Voice ID (copy from dashboard Voice Library)

flowDefinition.description: Conversation flow definition (only used when mode is `conversation_flow`)

testVariables.description: Variables used for test calls initiated from the dashboard

llmReasoningEffort.description: Controls the reasoning effort of the language model. Higher values produce more thorough but slower responses.

disableInterruptions.description: When enabled, the agent will not be interrupted by the caller while speaking

transferMode.description: Transfer mode. `cold` disconnects the AI before connecting to the destination. `warm` keeps the AI on the line to introduce the caller.

warmTransferConfig.description: Configuration for warm transfers (only used when transferMode is `warm`)

holdMessage.description: Message played to the caller while on hold

holdMusicEnabled.description: Whether to play hold music while the caller waits

summaryPrompt.description: Prompt used to generate a conversation summary for the human agent

introMessage.description: Message the AI speaks to the human agent before connecting the caller

playKeypadTouchToneEnabled.description: Enable the keypad input (DTMF) tool, allowing callers to press phone keys during the conversation

playKeypadTouchToneDescriptionOverride.description: Custom instructions for the keypad input tool behavior

knowledgeBaseRetrievalMode.description: How the agent queries linked knowledge bases. `automatic` retrieves context on every turn. `query_tool` lets the agent decide when to search.

knowledgeBaseChunks.description: Number of text chunks to retrieve per knowledge base query

knowledgeBaseSimilarityThreshold.description: Minimum similarity score for retrieved chunks (0-1). Higher values return only highly relevant results.

AgentCustomTool.description: Custom function calling tool for agents

httpMethod.description: HTTP method used when calling the webhook. Defaults to `POST`.

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers to include in webhook requests

queryParams.description: Custom query parameters appended to the webhook URL

sendRawRequestBody.description: When true, sends tool arguments directly as the request body instead of the default wrapper

httpMethod.description: HTTP method used when calling the webhook. Defaults to `POST`.

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers to include in webhook requests

queryParams.description: Custom query parameters appended to the webhook URL

sendRawRequestBody.description: When true, sends tool arguments directly as the request body instead of the default wrapper

schema.description: OpenAI function schema (can be null to remove)

httpMethod.description: HTTP method used when calling the webhook. Defaults to `POST`.

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers to include in webhook requests

queryParams.description: Custom query parameters appended to the webhook URL

sendRawRequestBody.description: When true, sends tool arguments directly as the request body instead of the default wrapper

agentCallerIdName.description: Caller ID name shown to recipient

agentName.description: Name of the agent that handled this call

recordingUrl.description: URL to call recording (available after call ends)

hangupCause.description: Reason call ended. Common values: USER_ENDED, END_CALL_TOOL, SILENCE_TIMEOUT, MAX_DURATION, VOICEMAIL_DETECTED

startedAt.description: When call was answered (null if never answered)

endedAt.description: When call ended (null if still ongoing)

durationSeconds.description: Call duration in seconds (null if never answered)

callerIdName.description: Caller ID name displayed to the recipient (max 15 characters)

skipQueue.description: When true, returns a 429 error immediately if the concurrency limit is reached instead of queuing the call

total.description: Total number of calls matching filters

hasNextPage.description: Whether there are more pages available

activeCalls.description: Current active calls (not affected by filters)

KnowledgeBase.description: Knowledge base with sources for agent retrieval

sourceCount.description: Number of sources in this knowledge base

sources.description: Sources in this knowledge base (included in get, not in list)

KnowledgeSource.description: A source within a knowledge base

fileSize.description: File size in bytes (for file sources)

displayName.description: Display name (optional, auto-generated from URL if omitted)

originalUrl.description: URL to fetch content from (http/https only)

AgentKnowledgeBaseLink.description: Link between an agent and a knowledge base

TestSuite.description: Test suite for evaluating agent performance

targetAgentId.description: ID of the agent being tested

testerAgentId.description: ID of a custom tester agent (null = built-in tester)

maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrent test calls (null = org default)

defaultVariables.description: Default variables for all test cases in this suite

targetAgentId.description: ID of the agent to test

testerAgentId.description: ID of a custom tester agent (optional)

defaultVariables.description: Default variables for all test cases

targetAgentId.description: ID of the agent to test

testerAgentId.description: ID of a custom tester agent

defaultVariables.description: Default variables for all test cases

TestCase.description: A test case within a test suite

scoringRubric.description: Criteria for evaluating the agent's responses

attemptsPerRun.description: Number of attempts per test run

variables.description: Test case specific variables (override suite defaults)

scoringRubric.description: Criteria for evaluating the agent's responses

attemptsPerRun.description: Number of attempts per test run

variables.description: Test case specific variables (override suite defaults)

scoringRubric.description: Criteria for evaluating the agent's responses

attemptsPerRun.description: Number of attempts per test run

variables.description: Test case specific variables (override suite defaults)

status.description: Current status of the test run

name.description: Test run name (optional, auto-generated if omitted)

TestAttempt.description: Individual test attempt within a test run

prompt.description: Description of the test scenarios to generate

previousMessages.description: Previous conversation messages for iterative generation
